name: HIGHER GROUND
description: Higher Ground is a 3D racing-like adventure game. You are Hoffman, a genius scientist who left behind in the polluted Earth, dedicates himself to escape to Mars. With your "friend" Swimmy, a one-manned spaceship, you will escape from Megaquake and harsh natural conditions.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4210M CPU @ 2.60GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4600 (2GB) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU G4560 @ 3.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
